title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus anymore. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
OB: The first Combo does not take focus when clicked on. It only takes focus when the combo list is dropped down.
EB: The focus caret should be in the first Combo 'Host:' when it is clicked on.
SR: When clicking on the first Combo, it should take focus and display the focus caret in 'Host:'. Currently, the focus caret is not appearing when the Combo is clicked on.
